text: @realDonaldTrump Defeated by a ramp with a 3 degree slope. Defeated by K-Pop. Defeated by an umbrella. Defeated by Coronavirus. Defested by unemployment. Defeated by civil rights. Defeated by #BlackLivesMatter. Defeated by @JoeBiden by a landslide. Loser.
